roleset.name: exist passively without using one's mind
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 47.1-1. Comparison to ‘languish’. Roleset by Julia.

example.name: Vegetative state
example.text: The patient vegetated for two years more, gradually dying from asthenia.

example.name: Both args
example.text: After a hard day's work, I vegetate in front of the television.
